titleStmt.title: SII 8.166: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 166. (A.R. No. 575 of 1902). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE KALISVARA TEMPLE, KALAIYARKOVIL, SIVAGANGA TALUK, RAMNAD DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śrīmaṟkittikkumel śrīkoccaṭaipaṉmarāṉa stribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīcuntarapāṇṭi
yatevaṟku Iyāṇṭu 10 2vatu siṅñanāyaṟṟu 2 10 9 Aparapakṣattu tṛtiyaiyum puta
ṉkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Irepati nāḷ tirukkāṉapperkkūṟṟattu nāṭṭu muṭi
kkarai Ūrārom coḻamaṇṭalattu vaṭakarai vikkiramacoḻaṉvaḷanāṭṭu Iṉṉa
mparnāṭṭu Ēṭurāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻaṉsavaṉṉamaṅkalattu kiḻavaṉāṉa pāratāyaṉ
Utaiyapperumāḷ comaṉātatevarāṉa vaidyaccakravattikaḷukku Iṟaiyilipiṭipāṭu paṇ
ṇikkuṭutta paricāvatu . Eṅkaḷur vaṭapālil mutaliyār puṣpavaṉacivarkku nāṅkaḷ tuṇṭippu I
ṟuppāka viṟṟu Ivarpakkal Ivar vilaikoṇṭu Aṉupavittuppotukiṟa tavaci kuḻiyāṉa tiruñā
ṉacampantanallūr Eṅkaḷur niccayippile tuṇṭippu Iṟuppāṉa Accup patiṉaiñcum Ittāl varu
m Upātikaḷum maṇṭapattile Eṅkaḷur niccayippiluṅ kaḻittu Uṭaiyār tirukkāṉapperuṭaiya ṉā
yaṉārkku tirumañcaṇappuṟamākak kaṭamaiyum Intac cakkiravattimutaliyār Akoracivarmutaliyārkku
k kārāṇmaikkāṇiyāy Ippaṭikkuk kallilum cempilum veṭṭivittukkuṭuppateṉṟu prasādañ ce
ytaruḷi tirumukam varukaiyil nāṅkaḷum Ippaṭikku Icaintu Eṅkaḷur variyilum kaḻittu Innāyaṉāṟku I⌈
ṟaiaiyilipiṭipāṭu paṇṇikkuṭukkaiyil Ittavacikuḻiyāṉa tevarkaṇāyakanallūr Eṅkaḷu ruṭaiyār tiruvantaricuramu
ṭaiya nāyaṉāṟku kaṭamai tevatāṉamāy Itu kaṭamai tavittu Iṟai pūṇkaiyil piṉpu Iṟaiyiliyākatt tirumuka
variyil kaḻikkaiyil Eṅkaḷu ruṭaiyār Antaricuramuṭaiya nāyaṉārkkup paḻaṅkaṭamaikku
Amutupaṭikku tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka Ivar vilaikoṇṭa nilattil ciṟupaṭi 4 + 1/20 Innilam nālu
māvukku cūḻellaikku kiḻellai ter pokiṟa vaḻikku meṟku teṉṉellai Īcuratevavayakkalukku te
ṉvarampukku vaṭakkup paṭaiyaṉkuḷattukku vayalūṭupāykiṟa kālukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭavellai poṉṉam
palavayakkalukku teṉvarampukkum melaittaṭiyil Ivvarampukku tevaiyāka Iṭṭa varampukkum teṟ
ku Āka Innāṉkellaikkuṭpaṭṭa taṭi palaviṉāl Eṟṟaccurukkamuṭpaṭa Iṭṭu ciṟupaṭi 4 + 1/20 Inni
lam nālumāvum Itil viḻukkāṭṭāl varum niropātiyum Innilaṅkaḷil niṟkiṟa paṉai mā Ilu
ppai puṅku puḷi Āvirai koḻuñci maṟṟum meṉokkiṉa maramum kiṇokkiṉa kiṇaṟukaḷum maṟṟum
m Epperppaṭṭa samasta prāptikaḷum Uṭaiyār Antaricuramuṭaiyanāyaṉārkku Iṟaiyili tiru
nāmattukkāṇiyākavum nikki puṣpavaṉacivar piṭipāṭṭiṉpaṭi Innāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa
naṉceyum puṉceyum mututaricum kuḷamum kuḷapparappum nattamum nattappāḻum cuṭukāṭu paṭutuṟaiyu
m Uṭumpoṭi yāmaitavaḻiyu meṉokkiṉa maramum kiṇokkiṉa kiṇaṟukaḷum paṉaimaram Iluppai
vākai vempu puṅku puḷi Āvirai koḻuñci Iṭaiyar Iṉavari cāṉṟuvari poṉmpāṭṭam E
ccoṟu kūṟṟuvāci maṟṟum Epperppaṭṭa samasta praāptikaḷil maṭaiyaṉaṅkaṉkuḷattukku vaya
lūṭupāykiṟa kāl niṅkalākavum Inta Uṭaiyār Antaricuramuṭaiya nāyaṉārkku Amutupaṭi
kku viṭṭa nilam nālumāvum Innilattukku muṉpu pecappaṭṭa poṉvariyum niṅkalāka puṣpavaṉa
civarperāl Eḻutiṉa piṭipāṭṭiṉpaṭi poruḷukkum nāṅkaḷ Iṟaiyil kaḻikka Iṟṟai nā
ḷāl parivaṭṭacciṟappākap paṟṟiṉa paṇam 7 100 5 10 Ippaṇam Eḻunūṟṟuampatukkum Itu variyi
le kakaḻittu Uṭaiyār tirukkāṉapperuṭaiya nāyaṉārkkuk kaṭamaiyum Intac cakkaravatti
mutaliyār Akoracivamutaliyārkkum kārāṇmaikkāṇiyumāka Iṟaiyili piṭipāṭu paṇṇikkuṭu
ttom muṭakkārai Ūrāyicainta Ūrom Inta Akoracivamutaliyār comaṉātatevarāṉa vaidya
ccakkaravattikaḷukku . Ivai Irācentiracoḻaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai Irācanārāyaṇatevaṉ Eḻuttu . coḻapura
tevaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai Ātippaṭṭattu pallavaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivaicoḻaṅkatevaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai coḻako
ṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai nilakaṅkaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai tavamaḻaikiyār Eḻuttu . Ivai va taraiyaṉ Eḻuttu .
Ivai vicaiyiṅkatevaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivarkaḷ colla Inta Iṟaiyili piṭipā
ṭu Eḻutiṉeṉ Inta nāṭṭukkaṇakku karumāṇikkāḻvaārāna Uṭaiyār Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 8.166 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
